Sequence Information.Peptide Name: NZ16K18R (peptide H6, Plectasin analog, NZ2114 derived, synthetic AMPs, UCSS1a; 3S=S)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, fungal defensin analog, fungi-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (97.5%) toNZ16KG: 20%; C: 15%, K: 15%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 25923 or ATCC 6538 or MRSA ATCC 43300 (MIC 0.028-0.114 uM), S. suis CVCC3309 or CVCC3928 or CVCC606 (MIC 0.014-0.028 uM), S. pneumoniae CVCC1.8722 or CVCC2350 (MIC 0.454 uM), Gram- S-enteritidis CMCC50336 (MIC> 7.273 uM), S-typhimurium ATCC14028 (MIC> 7.273 uM), S-choleraesuis CVCC503 (MIC> 7.273 uM), S-pullorum CVCC1789 (MIC> 7.273 uM), and E-coli CVCC195 or CICC21530 (MIC> 7.273 uM).Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris: expressed and purified in a fermentor.
Literature Information.Author: Chen H, Mao R, Teng D, Wang X, Hao Y, Feng X, Wang J. 2017
Literature Information.Title: Design and pharmacodynamics of recombinant NZ2114 histidine mutants with improved activity against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
